title: Designing Cities for Prosperity and Joy | BoF VOICES
itunes:title: Designing Cities for Prosperity and Joy | BoF VOICES
itunes:subtitle: Speaking at BoF’s VOICES, architect Vishaan Chakrabarti argued that a well-designed urban environment would result in greater prosperity, sustainability, equity and joy.To watch Vishaan's talk at VOICES 2018 click here. Sign up for BoF’s Daily Dige
description:
Speaking at BoF’s VOICES, architect Vishaan Chakrabarti argued that a well-designed urban environment would result in greater prosperity, sustainability, equity and joy.

To watch Vishaan's talk at VOICES 2018 click here. 

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.

For comments, questions, or speaker ideas, please e-mail: podcast@businessoffashion.com. For all sponsorship enquiries, it’s: advertising@businessoffashion.com.
